solution_line_template: His total speed from the trials is {total_trial_speed} because {trial_speed_1} + {trial_speed_2} + {trial_speed_3} = <<{trial_speed_1}+{trial_speed_2}+{trial_speed_3}={total_trial_speed}>>{total_trial_speed}
His average speed was {average_speed} mph because {total_trial_speed} / {number_of_trials} = <<{total_trial_speed}/{number_of_trials}={average_speed}>>{average_speed}
He needs to go {speed_difference} mph faster to make it to the top because {required_speed} - {average_speed} = <<{required_speed}-{average_speed}={speed_difference}>>{speed_difference}.
